short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: KBW: Speed up your typing! Timed tests, custom exercises & progress tracking for all levels. Enhance your skills on the go!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
1. The app calculates typing speed in words per minute (WPM) based on the user's input.
2. Records the time taken by the user to complete typing a word accurately.
3. Store the records globally for verified user.
4. Pressing the "Tab" key initiates a reset and fetches a new word for the user to type.

Enjoy!!
